list.s: I believe that color , religion , language , age , country , tribe , distance etc has nothing to do with real friendship , i believe real friendship is all about love , care , trust etc for each other .
Remember age, distance or color does not matter but love and understanding matters most in life.
Remember that age, color or distance or even language does not matter but true love matters a lot in life.
